Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Laramie
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Laramie due to pollice activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Laramie due to pollice activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
